title: rename ResponseBuilder's getQueryCommand to createQueryCommand
description: Discovered in SOLR-11343 that the method is not a getter but a creater method.

comments.content: Attaching proposed patch. The deprecated method would be for branch_7x only i.e. would be removed on master branch.
comments.author: Christine Poerschke
